description.value:
You can dash your foe to the ground with a single blow.

When you use @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Knockdown]{Knockdown}, instead of making a Strike followed by a @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Trip]{Trip}, you can attempt a single Strike. If you do and your Strike hits, you also apply the critical success effect of a Trip.

If you used a two-handed melee weapon for the Strike, you can use the weapon's damage die size instead of the regular die size for the damage from a critical Trip.
